author: jeffghome2020
title: StoryTime - A Writers Marketplace
description: Writers are subjected to unfair treatment as a result of their views and stories. Their freedom and rights are often at risk.
solution: We want to create a marketplace for them to sell their work and be fairly compensated in a decentralized safe environement via a DAPP.
experience: Founder of Cardano Outreach a fund4/6 winner. 20+ years experience as manger, business owner and educator.
